group_1.narration: [textRed:"Using your unique magic@to synthesize things into objects."]

group_1.textRight: That was what you wanted to train to do, correct?

group_1.textLeft: Yepperoni.

group_1.textRight: To begin with, you've already synthesized magic@from one person to another.

group_1.textCenter: [flashEffect:explosion]I'm gonna put my hands on both of your shoulders@for a sec.

group_1.textRight: Urgh...

group_1.textLeft: Ugh, argh...!

group_1.textRight: Wh-what happened...?

group_1.textLeft: I don't know, my body feels weird...@Something flowed inside me...

group_1.textCenter: Just now, I used my unique magic, synthesis.
I transferred Hagurin's special Witch-killing power@to you, Shigurin.★

group_1.textLeft: I really did a lot of damage to the Witch with that,@didn't I?

group_1.textRight: I was so nervous about losing the only thing@I had going for me.
It only lasted a short while, though,@and then my power came right back.
Would synthesis with objects be temporary, too?

group_1.textLeft: Probably, but I wanna try doing it anyway,@even if it doesn't last that long.

group_1.textRight: Um, um!
When Mitsune used her Doppel,@she could use her unique magic with it,
so maybe you can do the same thing when you@use your Doppel, Princess!

group_1.textLeft: I thought that'd give me a shot at it too, but like...
We can't use Doppels here in Takarazaki.
While I have nothing against Doppel usage,
what Her Highness is trying to do@requires a delicate hand.
Frankly, I'm not sure that summoning her Doppel@would help her succeed.

group_1.textRight: Aw...

group_1.textLeft: You did give me an idea, though.@Thankies, Miyurin.★
Are you gonna keep trying like you were earlier...?

group_1.textRight: Repeating the same thing again won't give her@different results.
Even training requires its own regimen.

group_1.narration: "The Princess's problem@isn't her caliber as a Magical Girl, but rather@that she is unable to consistently perform synthesis@outside of using it on other people."
"Hence, she first needs to learn how to quickly@and consistently use her unique magic in combat."

group_1.textLeft: Won't it be kind of hard to focus on using her magic@while she's fighting...?

group_1.textRight: If she can get a handle on it in battle,@then using it in daily situations will be easy.

group_1.textLeft: Oh... I think you trained me like that when I was@a Black Feather.

group_1.textRight: You remember that well, hm?
By the way, there's more to practicing@through combat than just stabilizing your magic.
Princess, when you combined Hagumu's magic@with Shigure's,
what sort of image did you have in your head?

group_1.textLeft: What kinda image...?@Just, like, the same things as usual!

group_1.textRight: ...And there lies the problem.

group_1.narration: "In this case, your issue is that@you don't have a concrete image in mind."
"Everyone is different,@but when it comes to unique magic@that has a variety of uses,@it's important to properly visualize your goal."
"That's why I think you should refine@your ability to visualize your magic being used.@Not only from person to person,@but from object to object,@or person to object."

group_1.textLeft: Visualizing...her magic?

group_1.textRight: For example, if a person who knows nothing about@swimming tries to do the breaststroke,
they won't be able to do it@because they have no idea how it works.
That's how I'd describe it.

group_1.textLeft: That makes sense...
If you don't know the basics,@you'll never get anywhere, is that it...?

group_1.textRight: Correct.@So, Your Highness, your task is:

group_1.narration: "To stabilize your power@when using your unique magic,@and to be able to develop@a more concrete mental image."

group_1.textRight: You'll be using your unique magic while fighting@a Witch
to get a better grasp on quickly visualizing@and using your ability.
If you understand,@then let's go find a Witch to defeat.

group_1.textLeft: ...I don't know if this cutie's really cut out@for that kinda Phys-Ed stuff...

group_1.textRight: [surround:3037A02][chara:6001:effect_7001_attack02]Yah!
Jeez! You're not even close to going down!
Instructor, isn't this enough?!@I'm already onto my third Witch!
If you count the Familiars,@I've killed like a billion of these things!

group_1.textCenter: [textRed:Human beings can only achieve their true potential@when put under extreme conditions.]

group_1.textLeft: GOD! You are SUCH a total knucklehead, Instructor!

group_1.textRight: W-w-wha?! Even if you're the Princess,@you can't just talk to Lady San like that!
